reviewText: Love Richard! Thanks.
This is a great deal. 4 individual dvd's for a great price and all are excellent movies. Richard Gere at his best! Buy this set. You'll love all 4 movies.
4 good movies for the price is a good deal. Richard Gere has delivered time and time again as a actor.

I only purchased it for Sommersby and Officer and Gentleman. Haven't see the other 2, but I do like most of the movies I've seen Gere in.  I particually liked Sommersby.........which wasn't  on of his better known movies.
This DVD pack was a great deal. I can watch Richard Gere from older to newer shows and drool with each age of Richard Gere.
Love getting 4 great movies in one box for one low price. Especially good with Prime. Had already seen the movies but wanted them for watching on a cross-country train trip. Very good movies.

Richard Gere is an excellent actor. I especially liked seeing An Officer and a Gentleman again. The interaction of Gere and his mentor in the story demonstrates the professionalism of these actors.
Whatever character is foisted on him; Gere always rises to the challenge.
I never saw it--it was a gift for a family (female) member who liked Richard Gere--and I owed her a return DVD and yes she liked it a lot.
If you love Richard Gere as an actor, I think this is a great set (at a great price!) to own.
Great collection
Excellent
I love Richard Gere. These are great movies! Absolutely love this set, great value too!
Richard Gere is my favorite.  Great price
Good.  I think Richard is a very good actor and I enjoyed this collection.
My mom loves this dvd set
Thank you love that movies
WHO DOESN'T LIKE RICHARD GERE?  THE SHIPPER LIVED UP TO PROMISE.
Perfect
I love it
all pretty good movies

Having the "An Officer and a Gentleman" DVD with anniversary commentary alone is worth the price. Plus add "Sommersby" (a heartbreaker) & "American Gigolo" (sexy) ... wow, definitely worth the set. Would have rather had "Pretty Woman" than "Nights in Rodanthe" (a chick flick) as the 4th DVD, but still glad I bought the set.
These were gifts for my sister in law who loved Richard Gere.
These are great movies
THANKS
Great collection of Richard Gere movies.unrated actor
LOVE "An Officer and A Gentleman", but the other movies on this DVD are mediocre..
GREAT BUY AND FAST SERVICE.
Some film is good other one is not good at all.
Love Richard Gere. It was great to get one dvd pack with my four favorite movies in it.
Classic Geer..  my ladie's choice.
Great movies.

Richard Gere at his best acting.  Very good films, highly recommend

Good Richard Gere movies!  An Officer and A Gentleman is worth the price of this DVD and then you get three other movies as well - a great bargain!!
